extendedInfo.description: Now, it supports the Chinese language only!(ç¹é«ä¸­æ)A mysterious box fell from the sky. The curious Snow White opened it and caused the fairy kingdom to disorder! Only save the fairy of gem can reseal the Pandoraâs box. Beautiful Scenes with varied colorful gems. Create your own fairy legend!Fairy Tale Kingdom Big 2 is followed the classic rules of Big 2. You can play it like you would normally play Big 2 (For 4 players, each gets 13 cards.). 3 of clubs goes first, either with a single card, a set of doubles, or a 5-card hand. Proceed clockwise until no one can beat the highest card in the round. Winner gets rid of all of his/her cards first.
